title: What was going on ?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: So i was in a game (ranked flex) and since the beginning i had over 1000 ping everytime i left the fountain, thinking that i had some internet issue i have done a internet speed test to check my ping ( the imgur link shows my ping when the game was still runinng ). Is this some kind of hack ? i have never had problems with my internet connection .

replies.body: Sometimes your own internet speed can be in perfect condition, but your network can have issues getting a stable connection to certain servers. It sounds like this may be the case since your ping outside of the game is fine, but inside is....a little sketch to say the least. There's a number of different settings that could be causing this, so let's cover all our bases by going through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
